versionA.text:
In this question type, you and your partner again coordinate your selections, but then you must also use the information given to formulate a final answer with your partner. 
 
 In this scenario, you are asked to calculate the area of the rectangle ABCD. The information you need to answer this question can be requested, but each of you can only request one value. Therefore, please talk to your partner and make decisions which information you would request.
